lead_paragraph: MADRID (Reuters - Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone, a month on from a second Champions League final defeat to Real Madrid in three years, has made it clear that his immediate future is with the Spanish club.

headline.print_headline: Simeone Vows to Stay On and Improve Atletico
headline.main: Simeone Vows to Stay On and Improve Atletico
